Description: Gold finger-ring, set with a sardonyx gemstone engraved with a bust of Pan.
Bibliographic references: Finger Ring / Catalogue of the Finger Rings, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum (505)
Gem / Catalogue of Engraved Gems & Cameos, Greek, Etruscan & Roman in the British Museum (1646)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
